summary: WHEN STOPPING FOR FUEL WHILE PULLING THE RV ON APRIL 21 I NOTICED THE UNIT TILTING TOWARDS THE RIGHT SIDE.  WHEN INSPECTED FURTHER I COULD SEE THERE THE FRAME HAD SPLIT NEAR THE SPRING MIDDLE MOUNTING AREA.  THE SPRING BRACKET ON THE FRAME WAS BENT IN GIVING NO SUPPORT TO THE LEAF SPRINGS CAUSING THE UNIT TO SAG TO THE RIGHT SIDE.  RV WAS TAKEN TO A REPAIR FACILITY WHERE IT IS CURRENTLY LOCATED AWAITING REPAIR.

TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2014 KEYSTONE FUZION. WHILE DRIVING 65 MPH, THE U BOLT IN THE REAR AXLE WAS LOOSE, SHIFTED THE TIRE BEHIND THE STABILIZER JACK, AND DAMAGED THE REAR DRIVER SIDE TIRE. DUE TO THE FAILURE, THE LEAF SPRING DETACHED FROM THE VEHICLE. THE VEHICLE WAS REPAIRED AND THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED. THE VIN WAS INVALID. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS UNKNOWN. UPDATE 01/15/16 MA

ATTORNEY REPRESENTING CONSUMERS WRITES IN REGARDS TO A DEFECTIVE TRAILER.  *SMD  THE LEAF SPRINGS WERE CRACKED AND BROKEN, THE MAIN WINDOW SHATTERED, THE BRACKETS FOR SKIRTING AND WATER WASTE WERE BROKEN. SCREWS WERE MISSING AND LOOSE FROM THE CORER POST, THE WINDOW SILLS WERE FALLING OUT, THE SLIDING GLASS DOOR FRAME WAS MISALIGNED, THE ELECTRIC COVER PLATE FELL OFF, THE CENTRAL VACUUM SYSTEM AND FIREPLACE STOPPED WORKING AND THE SOUND BAR SUPPORT BRACKET WAS BROKEN. *JB
